com.marginallyclever.artPipeline

Class TransformedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.artPipeline.TransformedImage

  • public class TransformedImage
extends Object
    TransformedImage is a BufferedImage, scaled, rotated, and translated somewhere on the drawing area (aka paper space). All sampling interactions with TransformedImage are done in paper space coordinates, and TransformedImage takes care of the rest.
    Author:
    droyer

      • sample

        public int sample(double x0,
                  double y0,
                  double x1,
                  double y1)
        sample the image, taking into account fractions of pixels. left < right, bottom < top.
        Parameters:
        x0 - left
        y0 - top
        x1 - right
        y1 - bottom
        Returns:
        greyscale intensity in this region. range 0...255 inclusive

      • sample1x1

        public int sample1x1(double x,
                     double y)
        Attempt to sample a pixel of the source image, if the (x,y) coordinate is within the bounds of the
        Parameters:
        x - paper-space coordinates of the image
        y - paper-space coordinates of the image
        Returns:
        255 if the image cannot be sampled. The intensity of the color channel [0...255]

      • sample1x1Unchecked

        public int sample1x1Unchecked(double x,

        Sample a pixel of the source image without a safety check.
        Parameters:
        x - paper-space coordinates of the image
        y - paper-space coordinates of the image
        Returns:
        255 if the image cannot be sampled. The intensity of the color channel [0...255]. the color channel is selected with
